text: and Sihon the king of Hezabon would not let us pass, because the Lord thy God had hardened his spirit and fixed his heart that he might be delivered into thy hands as now thou seest.

segments.text: and Sihon the king of Hezabon would not let us pass, because the Lord thy God had hardened
his spirit and fixed his heart that he might be delivered into thy hands as now thou seest.
